fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:
{code}
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `test`(
  `account_id` bigint, 
  `subscription_id` bigint, 
  `previous_subscription_id` bigint, 
  `subscription_effective_from_dt` date, 
  `subscription_effective_to_dt` date, 
  `order_completed_dtm` timestamp, 
  `subscription_status` string) STORED AS ORC;

insert into test values (1, 1, 1, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'ss');

SELECT
  account_id,
  subscription_id,
  previous_subscription_id,
  subscription_status,
  subscription_effective_from_dt,
  subscription_effective_to_dt 
FROM 
( 
  SELECT 
    DISTINCT account_id, 
    subscription_id, 
    previous_subscription_id, 
    subscription_status, 
    subscription_effective_from_dt, 
    subscription_effective_to_dt, 
    order_completed_dtm, 
    ROW_NUMBER()OVER(PARTITION BY ACCOUNT_ID) as r1
  FROM test
  WHERE account_id=1 
) AS RTE where r1=1;
{code}

Expected result:
{code}
OK
1	1	1	ss	NULL	NULL
{code}

Actual result:
{code}
Starting Job = job_1537276416358_0006, Tracking URL = https://node10.cluster.com:8090/proxy/application_1537276416358_0006/

Maybe this is not a bug, but MR has not enough resources to run this query.

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.summary: Reduce phase could not be completed on MapReduce engine
